snippet: Gov. Paul LePage said asylum seekers were Maine’s biggest problem because they brought disease, including AIDS and what he called the “ziki fly.”
lead_paragraph: Gov. Paul LePage said asylum seekers were Maine’s biggest problem because they brought disease, including AIDS and what he called the “ziki fly.”

headline.main: Maine: Governor Says Asylum Seekers Bring Disease
headline.print_headline: Maine: Governor Says Asylum Seekers Bring Disease
